website_summaries.verdict: A splitter that offers a seamless 3.5 millimeter audio device connection.
pros: Equipped with molded connectors that reduce strain
Features one 3.5 millimeter male and two 3.5 millimeter female audio connectors
Ensures you can simultaneously connect your headphones and external speakers to a computer
cons: Tends to wear down faster than other splitters
May produce static when in use

customer_reviews.title: Fail (on my part)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to split a signal so that I could listen to either speakers or headphones without having to crawl behind my large tower computer. The jacks didn't fit snugly into the splitter and unsurprisingly, I am only getting one channel out of my speakers and nothing out of my headphones. I'm altering this review because I realized when I went to remove the splitter that I hadn't pushed the jacks in until they snapped home. Obviously I was an idiot, the splitter works great when it is properly installed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Brakhage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two viewers on one tablet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect splitter to use with my tablet on flights. My wife and I can watch movies and TV shows on one tablet instead of needing seperate devices. This is helpful since not every flight has personal TVs for each seat. If you are not sure what this does, it takes the audio out of ONE source (phone, tablet, iPod, etc.) and allows you to use TWO sets of headphones or speakers. Pros: quality, small, works great Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It Works Kinda
customer_reviews.text: It works and the sound I'm getting is good. No crackling static or cuts. 👍 Was able to connect two of my bluetooth speakers via 3.5mm jack for some home theater sound. Was debating whether to pick up a sound bar but just got this splitter to do the job. BUT when I turn on my speakers they automatically go into dual stereo pairing mode. They will now sync whereas before this splitter they would not. Once connected I unplug one of the speakers and it's still in dual pairing mode so does this splitter really work? Theres also a bit of a delay with the TV sound. Price drops from $4.71 to $3.49 right after I buy it 😐...
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: No Need to Spend More
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality cable, with a lifetime warranty. There is no need to spend more, unless you want a more-polished appearance (e.g.,). Most of the negative reviews are from people who bought the wrong kind of cable. If you are trying to split a jack that has both speaker and microphone capabilities, you need a 4-Pole (TRRS) splitter. I am using one of these, along with a, to add a second pair of speakers to my computer (as part of a separate, standing-desk setup). It works perfectly for this.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Picard

customer_reviews.title: Served its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to crazy with researching splitters. Read the reviews for this and decided to go with it. Me and my wife were able to watch a movie together on our flight. It was awesome to be able to do that! I will note that this cable was longer than it needed to be. It added some hassle and unnecessary weight when having to fiddle around plugging everything in. Plus it was a bit stiff. The sound quality wasn't great, but it was good enough. I found myself having to tweak the volume levels a bit. Overall, i would like to see a shorter, less bulky version but would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Code Red

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a "splitter" that works
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few "splitter" cables at RatShack and Amazon that were actually not signal splitters, but they were signal separaters. That is, they would split a stereo signal into two separate leads -- one with the left and one with the right channel. It was really frustrating, but this cable actually is a signal splitter. If you want to share your laptop's, phone's, or tablet's audio with 2 outputs, then this is the cable to get. Skip all of the others. Tests fine with my Macbook Pro, Nexus 7, and HTC Incredible 2.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Friend
customer_reviews.text: The cheap amazon speakers don't come with a headphone jack on the front, so this saves me from bending around the back every dern time I want to switch between the two. Sturdy, thick cable. Its sound works great through both headphones and speaker, even at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ayris

customer_reviews.title: Works with Roku 4 remote
customer_reviews.text: I know what other reviewers are complaining about when it comes with the actual connection of the headphone jack, but I just got it in place and left it. The wife and I use it in bed so we can watch TV without waking our son. I just set the headphone jacks in the correct position and don't move them. It can be a pain sometimes, but I just deal with it. This is being used on a Roku 4 remote with no issues of sound level, we both are able to hear the TV/movie just fine.
customer_reviews.author: UnderCover_LPR

customer_reviews.title: Whatever you do, DO NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to do what any other splitter does. What a fool I was. Most of these negative reviews about a product not working you see, you think to yourself that you can just return it. That's what I thought too. I got a defective product, I could only hear out of one ear. So as any normal person would do, I tried to return it, but the manufacturer does not allow returns! What? Why? Please do not support this horrible company and their terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airplanes. Just remember you need an adapter for iPhones
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly to duplicate the headphone into two headphone jacks. Just remember that if you are using an iPhone without a headphone jack, you need to use the adapter. If you don’t have one, it might make sense to buy a lightning adapter or lightning to two headphone jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: 1 audio source, 2 automatic headphone out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cables for splitting a stereo source to 2 different stereo outputs and it does that perfectly. I was worried the split audio would be mono, or worse, the cable wouldn't work at all, but I was worried for nothing. I use this to split the source from a laptop so me and another person can watch videos with headphones, or to split the TV source for co-op gaming at night, without sacrificing volume. I have a feeling this would also work great for mp3 players in case you want to listen to music with a friend, but this way you can both use your own pair of head/earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dan.M

customer_reviews.title: This is probably best used in a fixed environment where you don't need ...
customer_reviews.text: This 3.5mm stereo splitter works correctly once you discover that you need to use rather enormous force to fully insert a plug into either socket. Just when you think the thing is ready to break the plug will snap in and remain snug. This is probably best used in a fixed environment where you don't need to remove the plug(s) very often. I'm using mine to branch several Infrared extender-transmitters to different equipment stacks where there is no line-of-sight between stacks. All are then controlled from a distant location over an HDMI extender using CAT-6 cable. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: truthteller

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby's getting hard of hearing. Bought an expensive wireless product we saw in a magazine and, after several days and other devices sent from provider, simply couldnt' get it to work. I decided I'd wear a set of headphones too, if I could find a splitter. We use it with a 25' cord that plugs into our transmitter that's hooked up to all the stuff that goes with TVs and other deviced nowadays, and the stereo sound is perfect for both of us. Definitely a cheaper fix than the wireless setup we initially purchased. Highly recommend this for anyone needing a headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn Magaditsch

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted - works great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed - I have Bose noise cancelling headphones and wanted to listen to a shared source with my fiancee on the plane. I had a typical Y splitter before but it was bulky and thus I didn't bring it on the last trip and then it turns out we totally needed it! This splits the audio and I tested on my computer that it preserves stereo in both headphones. Some people reviewing here either got the wrong part or assumed it wasn't stereo but mine certainly is. The box part is shorter than a AAA battery (less than 1.5 inches) and the whole item with the cord is under 6 inches. EXACTLY what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: jhauserman

customer_reviews.title: TV only has one headphone jack as is normal and all RCA spots are being used so this was my only alternative and it works just g
customer_reviews.text: I needed this in order to keep a Bluetooth speaker playing outside and hook up a Sony wireless headphone for inside without constantly removing one jack for the other. This works flawlessly. TV only has one headphone jack as is normal and all RCA spots are being used so this was my only alternative and it works just great with very little investment. These seem to be made well, are sturdy and need a definite push to click in the headphone jacks. All is good!
customer_reviews.author: john f

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and works flawlessly with my PC and Turtle Beach Headset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this splitter to use with my computer so I could test out different inputs with Xbox 360. It sounds crazy, but it ended up working really well and I am happy for this purchase. Came right on time and is very durable and hasn't failed me yet. It's a simple 3.5mm jack that splits into two 3.5mm females. This is very useful for many things and I highly recommended it. I for one use it to change my voice over Xbox Live (it's a practical use, but it is one out of many possibilities)
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great for laptops
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the sound quality of this one. He had another that would diminish quality greatly so this one makes a great choice when using high end headphones for gaming on the laptop
customer_reviews.author: Tat2edBoss

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted my two older kids to be able to listen to movies on the Nexus 7 tablet that they share while we are on road trips. This allows us to do just that. The plug is narrow enough that it fits in the restricted case on my tablet and it does truly split the sound into two stereo outputs. I had some cheap ones laying around that didn't stay in very well and output to mono. This slitter blows them out of the water. The quality is decent and what I expected when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: thewavebb

customer_reviews.title: Causes a feedback static hum  whenever both lines are connected
customer_reviews.text: When a single line is connected the sound is just fine but it causes a noticeable feedback static hum whenever both output lines are connected simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great on Flights
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use the splitter when flying because we can listen to the same music or watch the same movie from an iPhone or iPad on planes that don't have movies available. It works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Schwanke

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter to put a subwoofer in line with 2.0 speakers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable way to add another device into your audio output from your computer. The purpose for which I am using it is to add a subwoofer to the 2.0 speakers I am using for my desktop's audio. I put this splittter off the audio out of my computer. It then lets me hook in my M-Audio AV42 2.0 speakers and a Polk PSW10 subwoofer to support the speakers. No audio loss or drop of quality for the split, not a thing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: These work flawlessly and if you don't bend or pull on them all the time they should last, because the build is sturdy and high quality. The sound is as good as anything else I've used.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderBooks

customer_reviews.title: Gave so much static
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to connect two speaker systems, it ended up giving so much static that I had to buy from a local store the day of a party
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this audio splitter , unfortunately when I bought this I didn't factor in that my spy listening device is 'mono' so attaching two devices doesn't really work sometimes I'm not the sharpest tool in the shed but I'm sure I'll find other uses for it in time.
customer_reviews.author: Emery H.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed this splitter for our church computer to split between our overhead audio system and our desktop speaker. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: mwp1971

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I have to unplug and replug in my headphones to make sure the audio is playing correctly, but it was pretty cheap
customer_reviews.author: BriElle Achterhof

customer_reviews.title: strong and useful
customer_reviews.text: I thought ast first that by splitting the signal it would give me poor qualityin both leads I was wrongthe quality is fine through both sides I send my laptop signal to two small subwofers that runbetter quality speakers than you will find in your tv or laptop or phone so this splitter gets my vote for doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. James

customer_reviews.title: Works with Apple lightning cable converter & 2 different headphone brands
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my kids could watch a movie on a plane ride. Hooked this splitter into an Apple lightning cable converter so we could plug into an iPad. Kids headphone brands are LeapFrog and EasySMX. Worked great with audio in all four ears!
customer_reviews.author: goboilers05

customer_reviews.title: Works to split sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Works to split sound output from my TV in back where plugging and unplugging is difficult. So split and provide two external devices to use for different methods of providing sound!
customer_reviews.author: T Fowl

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, but mine came with a gouge in it
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, but mine came with a gouge in it. For the price I can't complain too much but the deepness of the gouge makes me a bit uneasy about wires being exposed. I would probably buy again... I assume this was an isolated problem. I was contacted by seller in a reply to this post. While I don't care to waste my time messing with a replacement for something so cheap (price wise), I will bump up my rating by one star... I appreciate good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K Dub

customer_reviews.title: Paired Sonos and Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pair my Sonos and Bluetooth reciever using this product. It did give me some distortion initially, but I was able to fix the issue by simply moving the cables around. This in turn allowed my to play both Sonos and Spotify at the same time. My fear is that this product might not last and/or possibly I recieved a dud. I will update this post if I have any issues. I recommend this product will work, but not sure about the durability. This product so far is 3.5/5. I will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Not for long time use
customer_reviews.text: This product somehow reduced sound quality. And after I use it for some time, not a very long time, one port stopped working, no sound on that port at all. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Barkatullah Yildirim

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting jacks,
customer_reviews.text: Used one for a couple years and just bought a second one. Works great. I also have used as a coupler using only the two female ends! Nice little thing to have in consumer audio toolkit.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality adapter.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple adapters that put the Male and Female connectors in a solid plastic block that plugged into my audio out and allowed it to drive two devices. Well, by the time you plug two cables into the block, it sticks out about three inches, and noticeably sags with the weight of the cables. Before long, the connections became intermittent, and I'd have to wiggle it. So I replaced the block with this flexible adapter and the mechanical and electrical connections are absolutely reliable. And the adapter isn't sticking out waiting to be bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: ... force the males in but they did click in sturdy once I tried hard enough
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fights for the females which I thought at first were too small and didn't want to force the males in but they did click in sturdy once I tried hard enough. The male sits very loosely into my sub woofer though and makes an annoying noise every time I move it. But it works as it should for the most part and it was cheap so I can't complain too much. 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Ugly Casanova

customer_reviews.title: This works great. I have 3 monitors at work and use ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I have 3 monitors at work and use speaker bars on our monitors for speakers, having the speaker on the left only was throwing off my brain since I am used to a full stereo sound. I added a second speaker bar so I had one on the right monitor and left monitor. However, this wouldn't work because the computer tower I have is limited in its sound card because its for business. I bought this y adapter and it solved my problem, I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to connect my headphones and speakers to a single input on my PC, now I can seamlessly switch between while in a game. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this so I don't have to have windows swap between two sound outputs as windows does not handle that too well. So now I just have to turn on my speaks, and they get audio.
customer_reviews.author: oneupthextraman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My roommate listens to his tv way to loud and I cant watch tv or play xbox in the living room when he does so i bought this along with iMBAPrice iMBA-PS-25MF 25-Feet Gold Plated 3.5mm Male to 3.5mm Female Extension Stereo Audio Cable. Both sides connect nicely and aren't hard to plug and unplug. Both sizes are stereo which was a problem with other splitters that I was looking for. One think i did notice is that when you plug in 2 pairs of headphones the volume does drop a bit but its not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for this price!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a fancy adapter and it didn't work. Ordered this last min and it came the next day!! Works perfect. Me and hubby were able to watch a movie together on the airplane without having to share headphones!!!
customer_reviews.author: cali

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing did it's job perfectly, was in a 12 passenger van for over 13 hours and there were movies and stuff playing but me and a friend wanted to listen to music on the drive so I got this. It does exactly what it should, it splits the audio from a 3.5mm jack into 2 separate 3.5mm jacks. The nice thing about this one compared to others is that this splitter doesn't send just the left pan to one pair of earbuds and just the right pan to the other, it sends the full audio spectrum to both pairs of earbuds which is exactly what you want! I'd recommend this any day.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: It worked, was cheap in price, and seemed to output two stereo feeds like I needed. I'm giving it 5 stars for that combination. If I had one comment it'd be that one of the plugs had the headphone jack did slip out a little bit when I didn't think it was tugged that hard (I can't be certain though since this was a splitter for use in the car for the kids to watch movies on the tablet). For the price though it certainly did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Eric I

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s just right. Using this to create a left right surround sound by keeping speakers on either side and it works great. No issues yet
customer_reviews.author: T13

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo Splitter Cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to split a stereo audio signal from my iMac. I can now have audio going to an external speaker and headphones at the same time. This is a well built cable. I notice no audio quality degradation at all while using this cable. I highly recommend it if you need to split your audio signal with another source.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A great and simple audio splitter.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly well, allowing signal inputs and outputs in both directions. I use it to connect two audio sources to a single audio system. The audio output signal slightly weakens when two sources are connected, but that's a natural behavior with unamplified splitters, like this one. The decrease in audio signal is not noticeable, signal-to-noise ratio stays strong.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A.

customer_reviews.title: The item works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to run audio from a TV to two sets of speakers, and it fulfills this function as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: It Made My Day...
customer_reviews.text: This cord made my day, Im an old stereo diehard and would never give up my JBLs to some surround system. With the puny bad sounding flat screen TVs I had to run out of the headphone jack on the TV, works fine, I moved and the TV sounded worse with higher ceiling so I bought a Yamaha TV speaker, It had a mini plug stereo jack, so looked and looked and here on Amazon. Good price works perfect with both system at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Seton

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with this. It works perfectly for splitting the sound. It does NOT split stereo to single left and right channels. Both outputs will receive both left and right signals. If anyone is curious to what I use this for (it seems like everyone else decided to tell), I have one output going to my computer speakers, and another one going to my headphones, which have an inline volume control. So I leave the headphones off, but I can just turn on the volume and grab them any time I need to. I'm quite happy with this, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Keith

customer_reviews.title: Hard to reach solution
customer_reviews.text: Using two sound devices, headphones and a blue-tooth option, the problem was getting to the plug. This splitter made the reach easy.
customer_reviews.author: T Fowl

customer_reviews.title: An excellent little thing that does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect my phone to 2 external speakers. The sound comes out perfectly through both speakers, not split into mono or anything like that. I was about to buy a much cheaper product that was supposed to do what this little thing does, but it's true that you get what you pay for. Pay a little more for a much better product! Only thing that took me by surprise was its size, I didn't expect it to be so tiny! Overall, I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: keaston

customer_reviews.title: 3.5mm Audio Extension Cable
customer_reviews.text: Nice extension for two people to listen in on book or music
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Really good adapter. I use this in my studio when recording with other people. I use my own pair of headphones outside the booth and one for inside the booth so tha me and the person in the booth hear the same thing. It works great for that purpose and I'm glad i bought it
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Navarro

customer_reviews.title: A true audio split instead of putting mono into each like is sometimes done
customer_reviews.text: Needed to connect both a 2 speaker and a subwoofer system to a computer with 1 audio port. This did the trick! Stereo on both. A true audio split instead of putting mono into each like is sometimes done. Connectors are high quality -- my cables connect tightly and snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Hann H.

customer_reviews.title: I received the splitter today and quickly used it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the splitter today and quickly used it to hook up two speakers from the Amazon Echo. One is the speakers started humming after hooking both up. I switched the speakers and then the second speaker started humming while the first worked perfectly. I then tried to return the product for a new one. However, the seller will not allow returns. I am now out the money and will have to buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with iPhone cable
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with iPhone earphone cables. I tried 3 pairs and the audio that comes out of the split signal ports is missing frequencies, especially vocals. I tried a non-iPhone cable (my Bose headphones) and the signal that comes out is more as expected. Not sure if I got a bad cable or if they are all like this?
customer_reviews.author: kbt

customer_reviews.title: At last, a splitter that ... lasts
customer_reviews.text: I was beginning to think that audio splitters were kind of disposable, like tissues... Use a couple of times and then discard. But we've been using one of these for over a year to listen to podcasts together and it's still working. Unfortunately my partner lent that one to his daughters so now we need another and I decided to buy some additional spares, just in case we lose one or this line of splitters is discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bellotti

customer_reviews.title: This is the best because when you make friends on a plane but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best because when you make friends on a plane but you're too tired to keep talking, you can just offer the person next to you to watch whatever you're watching. Awkward scenario, avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Price

customer_reviews.title: Plastic was a little cheap but it held up fine through travel. NO volume loss or feedback using it, which is great.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic case feels really cheap, but the device worked great! I got little to no volume loss and no feedback at all. Invaluable on a plane for 17 hours, fits perfectly into my laptop and both myself and my SO were able to watch movies without any issue. I would prefer if they made the cable sticking out of it a little longer, but it certainly serviced it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: BobOki

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price and they work great. Bought them for Kids and grand Kids for ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price and they work great. Bought them for Kids and grand Kids for trip to Hawaii. On plane ride they were able to shave Android movies and music,
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's a good item as you don't have to share earwax with ...
customer_reviews.text: splits the audio well! It's a good item as you don't have to share earwax with someone else which lowers the risk of ear infections
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Mom

customer_reviews.title: Simple.  Sound quality good.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Sound quality is good. My kids wanted to be able to listen to the same videos at the same time (and without me hearing it apparently). Seems to be good for our purpose. When both are not using it we just keep it connected with the single connection. Very inexpensive option. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike JM

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price but
customer_reviews.text: Fine for the price but quit working quickly. I bought it to use on a plane ride and it was perfect but pulled it out a few weeks later and it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: catinadress

customer_reviews.title: Short-term Solution
customer_reviews.text: Well, it worked like a charm. Updating on 4/26. Purchased this on 3/13. Now it does not work well. It buzzes all the time. I can't figure out why. It worked yesterday morning, and when I got home, it would cut out whenever my laptop was moved.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a while, and I've had no trouble with the audio quality or connectivity. With these, my daughter can play video games or watch YouTube with me at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: David Jansen

customer_reviews.title: perfect stereo and no noticible volume loss
customer_reviews.text: I just received this from StarTech.com. I hooked up two sets of ear buds and tested against a stereo test video on YouTube. Stereo separation is perfectly preserved and volume seems identical, to my ears, with this splitter and without. All tests were with two sets of ear buds attached to the splitter. Great product at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Grandeau

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product was inexpensively priced. Upon receiving it, I tested stereo on both sides and it was just fine. Construction is good but not robust. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Tolstoy

customer_reviews.title: Missing from today's shipment!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon screwed up again. This product was omitted from today's shipment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ragtime Bob Krone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, no static, and was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: tl1000r

customer_reviews.title: Dual stereo output for next to nothing
customer_reviews.text: I got this so that I could have both my headset with microphone and my speakers hooked up at the same time. It works great, the output of both the speakers and headset are stereo, there also is no crackling sounds if there is any movement in the cords that you usually get with the cheaper audio equipment. All in all, this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works like ti should but WARNING!!
customer_reviews.text: If you use a set of headphones that also has a mic it will cause a loss of channel in the other set. You need to use two sets that do not have mics built in.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rimkus

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this simple product. Used to split signal to two different devices and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, never worked and now I can’t return or replace it
customer_reviews.text: This never worked straight out of the box. I tried to return it but Amazon states it’s not available for returns or even replacements. Complete scam IMO, don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly what I needed. The only problem is if you leave it plugged in a front port with nothing plugged in, the pc senses that there is still something plugged in the front and won't send sound to the rear speaker outputs. Other than that, they work great. No quality or amplitude loss, even with both ports used at the same time. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Blain Kessel

customer_reviews.title: aaaa
customer_reviews.text: top Slim Stereo Splitter Cable - 3.5mm Male to 2x 3.5mm Female - Slim Phono Stereo Y Cable
customer_reviews.author: paul block

customer_reviews.title: Sound Reduced
customer_reviews.text: Works great and as advertised. The only thing bad about this thing is that it does reduce the sound by each item plugged in by 1/2. Since it is a sound splitter whatever you have plugged into it will not be as loud as it was before. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: product is as described
customer_reviews.text: it works well and they offer a fair price, I used it on my computer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was nothing like the product pictured. However, it works just the same; I just have to worry about the ends splitting the cable down to the input because the plastic stopper isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Swrrn

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. I've purchased several because I keep misplacing them ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to record to a voice recorder out of my laptop. Very useful. I've purchased several because I keep misplacing them when I need them the most. All have worked fine, exactly as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in to the TV set headphone jack and connected ...
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in to the TV set headphone jack and connected to two sets of TV headphones, works perfectly. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Better late than never
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this back in January and Just now received it in March after my address on the label was messed up. That being said, it's exactly what I needed to split outgoing sound to two headphone sets.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's designed to do. I live with roommates, so this comes in hand when watching movies while others are sleeping. It's easy to use and doesn't cause any static or interferences. Sound quality is good, too. Also comes in handy with kids in the car. Two kids can listen to their movie without disrupting the other passengers.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo De La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Only works half of the time. I wish I’d spent the extra money and bought a better quality splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for both of us when sharing a jack.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just in case there was an issue with any of our three in-flight entertainment systems on a long international flight. Lo-and-behold there was a problem both ways for about an hour each time, so my son and I were able to watch part of a movie together with this until our system's issues were resolved by the flight attendants. We both had excellent sound quality, in stereo, in both of our headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 pairs and only 2 came working. One of them never worked but I missed the return window .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still using over a year later
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm still using it for my PC audio. I split my sound output to speakers and a gaming headset. Maybe not audiophile quality but it works fine for casual PC gaming and iTunes audio while I work.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: very good splittelr
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Before I had a splitter where the female parts were a little bit too large so they didn't grip the stereo cords too well. This is an improvement. It grips the cables very well. I can play my computer's music on my stereo and my integrated speakers in the screen at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: ewd

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to allow for multiple headphones to listen to a single device. Could barely hear anything when used. Silver lining is that the purchase was refunded, but I'll need to look into some of the more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Quan

customer_reviews.title: Not that slim
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be as slim as the MobilePal Gold Plated Headset Audio Jack Extender ( However the diameter of the jack is slightly larger. I was hoping that it would work with the rooCASE eXTREME Hybrid ( TPU Shell Case for Apple iPad Mini 7.9-Inch Tablet. This is the reason why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wowhead

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item and its zip-lock package were chewed up and in bad cosmetic shape before they were put in the shipping package, which is not damaged. It works, but it's ugly. I don't want to deal with a return, but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jared J.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: this replaced a slightly larger splitter that had some issues with the volume control (and got lost). I pretty much only need this on companion air flights. It is great to have a simple compact splitter that does its job. It is well made and the connections satisfyingly snap tight. The sound isn't degraded and the volume can be controlled via the upstream device. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product; did not work at all! Called and received full refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: This earphone splitter worked great. We used in with our cellphone
customer_reviews.text: This earphone splitter worked great. We used in with our cellphone, our ipad and macbook pro without any issues. Kids could watch the same video wearing their own headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Vanito

customer_reviews.title: Slim Cable - mobile: Poor quality - Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The two female 3.5mm ports do not "latch" onto the inserted cables. This allows the cables to slide in-and-out with no friction. The audio thus drops out, has static, or worse, the cable falls out completely. I've never seen a 3.5mm cable like this before.
customer_reviews.author: SnednarB

customer_reviews.title: haven't broke
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, its just a splitter. It does the job, haven't broke since I put it on about a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kensukebook

customer_reviews.title: Don't know your application, but this thing works!
customer_reviews.text: It works and still is going strong.... I use it in my convoluted but efficient desktop configuration between my laptop, docking station, PC speaker system, iPhone, and wired PC headset... Good quality, sturdy built....
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR ZAMORA

customer_reviews.title: Solid connections - No static!  :+)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my wife and I could share headphone jack on an tablet while on a long airplane trip. It worked great. We each used our own headphones (not included). The connections are solid and there was no static. I'm glad I thought to buy this in advance of my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Photon Xprt

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: The sound is terrifically hollow and only partially plays from one jack, while the other jack offers no sound at all. Might be a fluke in the quality of this one particular unit, but the one sitting in front of me simply does not function as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Turn Up the Volume
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Keep in mind you may have to turn up the volume a little on whatever device you are listening to to help drive the second set of magnets in your headphones. But this is normal and in no way fault of the product. My wife and I were able to watch movies together as we flew away on our honeymoon. Dreamy! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: WhiteWuf

customer_reviews.title: Great splitter
customer_reviews.text: This a great 3.5 mm splitter. It is 6 inches long which is just right. The plug snaps tightly into the headphone jack, and the headphones or other devices snap tightly into the jacks on this splitter. There seems to be no loss of sound quality what so ever, plus the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good splitter
customer_reviews.text: Nice little splitter. Audio quality seems the same as before without the splitter. Cable quality seems good, haven't had any issues after several months.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

product_meta.title: StarTech.com 3.5mm Audio Extension Cable - Slim Audio Splitter Y Cable and Headphone Extender - Male to 2x Female AUX Cable (MUY1MFFS),Black
product_meta.description: Length:Slim Cable| Style:BlackThis 3.5mm audio extension cable features one 3.5mm male and two 3.5mm female audio connectors, splitting a single headphone jack into two. Ideal for Travel Featuring a small form factor design, this 3.5mm aux Y cable fits perfectly in your carrying case, making it the ideal travel companion. The audio splitter cable features a slim connector molding that fits easily into a 3.5mm headphone jack even if the device is in a protective case, providing users with a practical and portable audio solution. Extremely Versatile This mini audio jack splitter extender can be used to split one 3.5mm audio jack into two separate outputs, enabling two sets of speakers to be used with a single sound card. It is great for splitting audio from your mobile device or allowing you to listen to isolated audio while recording, making it a great solution for creative professionals. Create a High-Quality Connection This audio splitter / Y cable features molded connectors with strain relief, providing users with a secure connection. As well, the splitter cable has an insertion rating of 5000 cycles, ensuring reliability. This 3.5mm audio extension cable is backed by a StarTech.com lifetime warranty and free lifetime technical support.
feature_bullets: SHARE YOUR CONTENT: Use this 3.5mm audio extension cable to listen to music or watch videos together. This AUX cable features a 1x male to 2x female connection for dual stereo / audio output.
MINI AUDIO JACK SPLITTER EXTENDER: Designed to be compact, this slim audio splitter cable fits perfectly into your laptop bag, making it ideal for professionals on the go.

HIGH QUALITY CONNECTION: This 3.5mm Y cable features molded connectors with strain relief delivering a secure connection every time. The audio splitter cable also has an insertion rating of 5000 cycles making it a cost-effective solution.
MULTI-USE FUNCTIONALITY: This headphone / audio splitter lets you to split one 3.5mm audio jack into two separate outputs, enabling two sets of speakers or headphones to be used simultaneously.
LIFETIME WARRANTY: Constructed of high-quality materials, this 3.5mm audio extension cable is backed by a StarTech.com lifetime warranty and free lifetime technical support.
Connector type: 1 - 3.5 mm Mini-Jack (3 Position) Male to 2 - 3.5 mm Mini-Jack (3 Position) Female
